Posts.Content: Nov 21, 2018 01:43AM coclico wrote: hello all, am due to have prophylactic double mastectomy with nipple sparing direct to implant on Dec. 19, and will start a new job 19 days later... not worried about surgery, am worried I will not be able to start new job as planned. I plan to relax for 14 days, then, hopefully for the last 5 days before job starts, get it together! any tips welcome.
Posts.Title: November 2018 Surgery Support Group evily RosieRed
